• Browser-based multiplayer mining game with real-time voxel exploration.
  • Features procedurally generated maps, player progression, and resource trading.
  • Includes mobile controls, chat, admin tools, and cloud save functionality.
  • Uses MQTT for real-time multiplayer networking and IndexedDB for local persistence.
    const GameEngine = class { constructor() { /*... */ } };
    const NetworkManager = class { constructor() { /*... */ } };

Mega Miner Online is a real-time multiplayer mining game built with HTML5 Canvas and WebSockets. Players explore procedurally generated voxel worlds, mine resources, upgrade equipment, and trade with others. The game features mobile controls, chat systems, admin tools, and cloud synchronization for cross-device saves.
